title: Tripura to roll out AI policy soon, announces CM Saha
description: Tripura is set to launch an Artificial Intelligence policy. This follows the inauguration of the State Innovation Mission, T-NEST. The state aims to use AI for better city management and public services. An AI Centre of Excellence is also planned. These initiatives will foster innovation and attract digital economy investments, positioning Tripura as a technology hub.
content:

title: Hacker used Anthropic's Claude AI to steal Mexican government data
description: A hacker exploited Anthropic PBC’s artificial intelligence chatbot to carry out a series of attacks against Mexican government agencies, resulting in the theft of a huge trove of sensitive tax and voter information, according to cybersecurity researchers.
content: A hacker exploited Anthropic PBC’s artificial intelligence chatbot to carry out a series of attacks against Mexican government agencies, resulting in the theft of a huge trove of sensitive tax and voter information, according to cybersecurity researc... [7405 chars]

title: Apple seeks dismissal of fraud lawsuit over Siri AI, Epic injunction
description: Feb 26 (Reuters) - Apple ⁠urged a federal judge to dismiss a proposed class action claiming it defrauded ⁠shareholders twice, by overstating the artificial intelligence capabilities of its Siri voice ‌assistant and falsely representing its compliance with an injunction governing commissions on app sales.
